About Me

I am most skilled in devouring pizza and gulping coke

My Personal Projects

Dorylus

that cool blockchain project

A decentralized, serverless blogging WEB 3.0 app built on top of Ethereum platform. It leverages IPFS, MetaMask and Web3.js. It gives you the ownership of your content and a platform where you can incentivize your content. Viewers can also tip off the writers for the blogs they publish. The platform establishes its own custom ERC20 token called Tsukiyomi to rally the community around.

ChessVista

another dope ml/ai project

Web app which uses Convolutional Neural Network to detect chess board and different types of pieces present in an image and allows user to bring the game from a snapshot to playable game on screen.
